prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that has a rugged appearance and is inspired by mountain landscapes.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a boulder but can move and has a mischievous personality.
Generate a Pokemon with a rocky texture and earthy colors, perfect for cave habitats.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the strength of rocks and has arms resembling stone formations.
Imagine a sturdy rock-type Pokemon that is known for its defensive capabilities in battle.
Design a Pokemon that is a mix of rock and ground types, featuring a bold color palette.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like it's made of gravel but has a friendly demeanor and playful nature.
